<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mesmerizing Gaze](/Feats.aspx?ID=1933) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 166 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Celebrity](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=54)

**Prerequisites**
[Celebrity Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1931)

</column>

---

When you meet someone's gaze, they are unable to look away. Choose one target creature. That creature must succeed at a Will save or be [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14) until the end of your next turn; the DC for this save is equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. If the creature succeeds at its save or its fascination ends due to a hostile action, it becomes temporarily immune to your Mesmerizing Gaze for 1 day.

When you select this feat, it gains either the [arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11) or [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120) trait; once you make this choice, you can't change it.

<title level="2">Mesmerizing Gaze leads to...</title>
[Acknowledge Fan](/Feats.aspx?ID=4150)
name: Mesmerizing Gaze
